wikipedia_page.main: Dean Lockhart is a Scottish politician serving as Convener of the Net Zero, Energy and Transport Committee since 2021. A member of the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party, he has been a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Mid Scotland and Fife region since 2016.
